attributes.action: Minimum 5% Increase of wages for all NHS staff.
attributes.additional_details: After years of pay freeze and the extreme pressures the NHS has seen over the past year leading to stress, anxiety and PTSD from the COVID-19 pandemic means they deserve this review and an increase.
attributes.background: After the year they’ve had so far, all NHS workers deserve to have a Review their salary and increase it greater than the rate of inflation and at a minimum of 5%. Applied to all who work in the NHS.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions about NHS pay, which you might like to sign:

Provide a Pay increase of 7% to all our NHS workers fighting COVID19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/568373

Recognise all members of NHS nursing profession by giving them a 12.5% pay rise: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560253

Increase pay for all NHS staff by 15%: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/565151

We should increase the pay of our NHS staff by 25%: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/563356

Automatic Yearly Pay Rise For NHS Health Care Workers: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/565256
